Little Miss Muffet.translation[0].defini: a character from a nursery rhyme (=an old song or poem for young children). She is a young girl who is frightened by a spider and runs away
Little Miss Muffet/Sat on a tuffet, /Eating her curds and whey;/There came a great spider, /Who sat down beside her, /And frightened Miss Muffet away.
